attributes.action: create a legal definition of the words Vegan and Vegetarian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Governement has confirmed there is no legal definition of 'Vegan' or 'vegetarian' in the EU or UK. We call upon the Govt to draw up a framework using the model of 'Organic' and The Indian Government's experiences to create a legal definition for 'vegan' and 'vegetarian'

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "create a legal definition of the words Vegan and Vegetarian."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14431.asp

Prime Minister's Office
